name: Swift Exporters
title: Fastest Customs Clearance
description: In 2023, North Macedonia achieved the fastest customs clearance time for exports, averaging just 1.1 days. This efficiency places the country at the forefront of global trade logistics.

name: Service Sector Slump
title: Service Sector Collapse
description: The service sector in North Macedonia experienced a dramatic decline in 2023, with an annual growth rate of -100%. This downturn highlights significant challenges within the sector.

name: Healthy Beginnings
title: Perfect Birth Registration
description: In 2019, North Macedonia achieved a 100% completeness rate for urban birth registrations, ensuring every child is accounted for from birth.

name: Non-Communicable Concerns
title: High Non-Communicable Disease Rate
description: In 2019, 96.13% of deaths in North Macedonia were due to non-communicable diseases, indicating a significant public health challenge.

name: Balanced Wealth
title: Equitable Income Distribution
description: In 2019, the fourth 20% of income earners in North Macedonia held 24.8% of the national income, reflecting a relatively balanced income distribution.

name: Low Communicable Disease Impact
title: Minimal Communicable Disease Deaths
description: In 2019, only 1.28% of deaths in North Macedonia were attributed to communicable diseases, showcasing effective healthcare measures against these illnesses.
